New Records: CJ McCollum matched his career high with 50 points
CJ McCollum nearly matched his own team record of 11 threes
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 10 three-point baskets in 16 attempts
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum told New Orleans coaches, ‘I’ll be at 40 percent in 10 days'
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum noted that his family provides clear motivation
CJ McCollum said, ‘I want (my kids) to know that their dad gave it his all'
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum's 50-point eruption was one of the greatest shooting performances in Pelicans franchise history
Others: CJ McCollum's shooting splits over the last four games are a scorching 57/51/83
